casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert A.D. WALDRUP 189P17-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Robert A.D. Waldrup, For Waldrup, Robert A.D. Tracy Nayer, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of December 2017 by Defendant for an Evidentiary Hearing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
